html:
Business Creativity and Innovation

Succeed in creating something new in future business. In this module, you will develop your capability for creativity and innovation, exploring the boundaries typical of modern business and how they can be overcome to position organisations for future growth.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate a systematic understanding and awareness of new insights of contemporary issues pertaining to the development and commercialisation of innovative solutions.

+  Demonstrate critical understanding of customer psychology and reflect on its impact on adoption and diffusion of innovation.

+  Demonstrate knowledge and understanding of principles and techniques of idea generation and the application of creative entrepreneurial knowledge, evaluation of contemporary global developments in creating innovations based on sustainability and ethical aspects.

+  Formulate and develop creative business strategies to manage the commercialisation of innovative solutions that will further strengthen competitive advantage.

Module Content:
